mapper.select: select questionnaire_no, questionnaire_title, questionnaire_content, to_char(q_enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') q_enroll_date, q_status from questionnaire order by questionnaire_no DESC

select questionnaire_no, questionnaire_title, questionnaire_content, to_char(q_enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') q_enroll_date, q_status from questionnaire where q_status='Y' and questionnaire_no = #{questionnaire_no} order by questionnaire_no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into questionnaire (questionnaire_no, questionnaire_title, questionnaire_content, q_enroll_date, q_status, m_no) values(SEQ_QNO.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, #{ questionnaire_content }, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, #{ m_no })
insert into questionnaire_answer (answer_no, enroll_answer, a_enroll_date, a_status, questionnaire_no, m_no) values(seq_answer_no.nextval, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, #{ questionnaire_no }, #{ m_no })
mapper.delete: delete from questionnaire_answer where answer_no=#{ answer_no}
